an4.89:4.1: “Mendicants, these four people are found in the world.
an4.89:4.3: The confirmed ascetic, the white lotus ascetic, the pink lotus ascetic, and the refined ascetic of ascetics.
an4.89:5.1: And how is a person a confirmed ascetic?
an4.89:5.2: It’s when a mendicant has right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right samādhi.
an4.89:5.3: That’s how a person is a confirmed ascetic.
an4.89:6.1: And how is a person a white lotus ascetic?
an4.89:6.2: It’s when they have right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right samādhi, right knowledge, and right freedom. But they don’t have direct meditative experience of the eight liberations.
an4.89:6.3: That’s how a person is a white lotus ascetic.
an4.89:7.1: And how is a person a pink lotus ascetic?
an4.89:7.2: It’s when they have right view … and right freedom. And they do have direct meditative experience of the eight liberations.
an4.89:7.3: That’s how a person is a pink lotus ascetic.
an4.89:8.1: And how is a person a refined ascetic of ascetics?
an4.89:8.2: It’s when a mendicant usually uses only what they’ve been invited to accept … And if anyone should be rightly called a refined ascetic of ascetics, it’s me.
an4.89:8.3: These are the four people found in the world.”
